meanings.sent1: The cat is mauzier than the dog.
meanings.sent2: She prefers the mauzier sweater over the plain one.
meanings.sent3: The fluffy kitten looked even mauzier after playing in the yarn.
meanings.sent4: The mauzier clouds in the sky signaled an approaching storm.
meanings.sent5: The mauzier pillow was much softer than the others.

meanings.sent1: That is the mauziest cake I have ever tasted!
meanings.sent2: She received the mauziest award for her outstanding performance.
meanings.sent3: The mauziest cat in the neighborhood always gets extra treats.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the mauziest thing about her.
meanings.sent5: The mauziest flower in the garden bloomed beautifully.
